- Location: Exterior perimeter along vinyl siding; foundation obscured by dense vegetation.
- Materials: Vinyl siding with wooden trim; tall ornamental grasses and weeds; tree trunk in background.
- Condition: Overgrown ground cover leaning against siding; no visible structural damage.
- Risks: Potential moisture retention against foundation; pest/habitat harbor; restricted exterior access for inspection.
- Recommendations: Trim vegetation back 12â€“18 inches from siding; remove excess thatch; ensure drainage away from foundation; monitor for moisture intrusion.
